title: How should the Magnisky Act be implemented?

replies.msg:
I think the #MagnitskyAct should apply to the current government officals ❨e.g.: Carrie Lam, Teresa Cheng, etc. ❩, former government officals❨CY Leung, Donald Tsang, Tung Chee-hwa, etc. ❩ and CEOs working in public services corporations ❨CEOs of Cathay Pacific, MTR,etc. ❩

Hence, people working in those positions in the future can be restricted by the Act, which makes the Act sustainable instead of a one-off benefit show.

In short, the #MagnitskyAct should target the positions instead of specific persons.
